first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}Police Department Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay {00003} bail as soon as possible

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}Police Department Your son-in-law arrested for prostitution. Pay {00003} bail soon
Oh no, that sounds terrible! How much is the bail?
It's urgent, pay {00003} soon to prevent embarrassment.
Alright, I'll arrange the payment immediately.

first_turn: Hello, here is the manual customer service of {00004}. As the exam is approaching, I wonder if you need the exam questions. Can you fill in the link you sent you for a while and finish the reservation?

dialogue.text: Manual service of {00004}. Exam's near, need questions?
I'm aware it's a scam. No thanks.
But {00004} can help with the link.
I won't be clicking any links. Goodbye.

first_turn: The exam will be in a few days. How are you preparing? The exam will be in next week. I'm so nervous

dialogue.text: The exam is in days. Preparing? I'm nervous.
I'm not sure, but I think I'm ready. Why are you asking?

first_turn: Hello, it takes you a few minutes. This is the customer service of the {00005} agency center. Our agency recently launched a high-value credit card acceptance service. It does not require too many procedures. As long as you pay the {00006} handling fee, you can get it for you.

dialogue.text: Hi, takes a few mins. This is customer service of {00005} agency. We have a new credit card service. Pay {00006} fee to get it.
Oh, really? What does the {00006} fee cover exactly?
It covers processing your application quickly, {00005} agency policy.
Sounds interesting, but I'm skeptical of these quick {00005} agency services.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am a staff member of the Venezuelan Embassy. The passport accepted with your ID is suspected of illegal entry. An arrest warrant has been issued to you, and you need to pay £1,000 to avoid being arrested.

dialogue.text: Sorry, I am a Venezuelan Embassy staff. An arrest warrant for illegal entry requires you to pay £1,000.
Oh, I didn't realize this was an issue. How should I make the payment?
You can transfer the £1,000 immediately to avoid further problems.

first_turn: Hello, this is an office worker of the Swiss Embassy. Someone stole your identity information and applied for a bank card at {00007} and used this card to abscond with the money. He is currently arrested at {00008}. Now you need to connect to the designated police station to explain the situation, otherwise it will have an impact on your credit situation.

dialogue.text: Hi, this is from the Swiss Embassy. Someone used your ID to get a bank card at {00007} and took money. He was caught at {00008}. You must contact the police to avoid credit issues.
Oh no! What should I do now?
You need to connect to the police station. I can help with that.
Yes, please guide me on what I need to do.

first_turn: It's me, can you hear it clearly? I just made an appointment with a leader and needed to give gifts to the leader to do something. Can you use {00009} to help me transfer some money?

dialogue.text: It's me, can you hear it? I made an appointment with a leader and needed to give gifts to do something. Can you use {00009} to help me transfer money?
Nice try, but I'm aware of your game. I've reported you to the authorities, {00009}.

first_turn: Hello, it will take you a few minutes. I am from {00010}. According to the latest relevant policies issued by the country, the house you bought can now enjoy the preferential policies of {00011}. You need to cooperate with me to do facial recognition.

dialogue.text: Hello, this is quick. I'm from {00010}. Your house qualifies for {00011}. Please do facial recognition.
Oh, really? What do I need to do for that?

first_turn: Hello, it will take you a few minutes. I am from {00010}. The latest country has issued relevant policies. The house you purchased can now enjoy {00011} discount. You need to go to the nearby {00007} ATM to launch a tax refund according to my needs.

dialogue.text: Hello, a few minutes from {00010}. Recent policies let your house get {00011} discount. Visit nearby {00007} ATM for a tax refund.
Nice try, but I know it's a scam, so I'm not doing anything.

first_turn: Hello, I am an office worker at {00012}. Someone used your identity information to apply for a mobile phone card and used this mobile phone number to deceive citizens' property in {00002}. If it is not done by yourself, you need to prove to the {00002} police station that these messages were sent were not sent by you.

dialogue.text: Someone used your ID for a mobile card at {00012}, deceiving property in {00002}. Prove to {00002} police if not you.
Oh my gosh, really? What should I do now?
You need to contact the {00002} police immediately and provide proof.
Alright, I'll do that. Thanks for letting me know.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, this is {00002} Police Department. Criminals use your identity information to transfer stolen money. You are currently wanted by the police online. You need to click the link I sent you to update your personal information.

dialogue.text: Sorry, this is {00002} Police. Criminals use your identity for stolen money transfers. You are wanted online. Click the link to update info.
Oh my goodness, I had no idea! I'll click it right away.

first_turn: You remember the school loan you applied for. If you pay it back, remember to cancel your account; if you haven't paid it back, remember to log in to your account every month. I'm worried that we will be stolen.

dialogue.text: Remember the school loan you applied for? If you paid, cancel the account; if not, log in monthly. We could be stolen.
Oh no, I wasn't aware of any issues! How can I check the account status?
Just provide your details, and I'll verify it for you.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, here is the office staff of the {00005} agency workstation. There is a good high-value credit card agency service recommended to you. This service is free of certificates and is processed quickly. The acceptance of this service requires a {00006} deposit.

dialogue.text: Sorry, {00005} agency recommends a high-value credit card service. {00006} deposit needed.
Oh, that sounds interesting. How does it work?
It’s quick and free of certificates. Just provide a {00006} deposit.
Great! I’d love more details on the application process.

first_turn: Hello, I am a staff member of the {00013} service department. We found that a courier package you sent seemed to contain contraband. If this courier was not sent by you, you need to report the case to the {00002} police and explain that this matter has nothing to do with you.

dialogue.text: Hello, I'm from the {00013} service. A package sent by you has contraband. If not sent by you, report it to {00002} police.
Oh no, I didn't send anything. What should I do next?

first_turn: Hello customer, I am an office staff member {00013}. I am very sorry, because of the mistakes of our staff, your express delivery was lost. We will accept compensation for you here. We have arranged a special claim staff member for you, and you need to add {00014} to carry out specific claims operations.

dialogue.text: Hello customer, I am office staff {00013}. Your delivery was lost. Add {00014} for claims.
Oh no, that's unfortunate. How do I add {00014} for the claims?

first_turn: Hello? Is it {00001}? I am your high school mathematics teacher. I will give you a bank account. I need to make money for this account. But it is not convenient for me now. I will give you an account. You can transfer it to this account.

dialogue.text: Hello? Is it {00001}? I'm your high school math teacher. I need to make money for an account. Can you transfer to it?
Oh, hi! I wasn't expecting to hear from you. Sure, just send me the details.
Great, I'll send the account info shortly. Thank you, {00001}.

first_turn: Hello, I am {00015} Could you ask if you applied for medical reimbursement before? It has not been issued yet. I can transfer it to the Finance Department for you. Please ask them for details.

dialogue.text: Hello, I am {00015}. Did you apply for medical reimbursement? It's not issued. I can transfer it to Finance. Please ask them.
Oh, I didn't realize there was an issue. Can you transfer it for me?
Sure, I'll handle it and let you know when it's done.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you. I am the customer service of {00016}. I contacted you because I am very sorry. Many people have reported that the milk you bought some time ago has diarrhea after drinking it. There may be problems. We will compensate you {00017}. If you want to make a claim, you need to add my {00014}. This will help me guide you to the next step.

dialogue.text: Sorry to bother. I'm customer service of {00016}. Milk you bought may cause diarrhea. We compensate {00017}. Add my {00014} for claim.
Oh, that's concerning! I definitely want to make a claim. What do I need to do?

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am the manual customer service of {00018}. Because you bought stocks in our company before, and now you have a very good stock. This stock can ensure you make a stable profit. If you are interested in this stock, you can book it through the link I sent you later.

dialogue.text: Sorry to bother, I'm with {00018} customer service. You can book a stock for a stable profit using the link I'll send.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What do I need to do?
Just check your email for the link to proceed.

first_turn: Hello, this is the customer service of {00013}. I called you because we have a courier here, and the recipient is you, but this package contains prohibited items. You need to come to the Ministry of Public Security in the city before 6 pm this afternoon to explain that this courier has nothing to do with you

dialogue.text: Hi, this is {00013}. A courier with prohibited items is for you. You need to visit the Ministry of Public Security by 6 pm today.
Oh no! What kind of prohibited items are in the package?
We can't disclose that over the phone. You need to come to the Ministry of Public Security to clarify.

first_turn: Hello, it will take you a few minutes. I am {00010}. According to the latest national policy, you meet the conditions of {00011} and can enjoy the preferential policy of tax refund. You need to cooperate with me to do facial recognition.

dialogue.text: Hello, just a few minutes. I am {00010}. You meet {00011} conditions for a tax refund. Need your help for facial recognition.
Oh, really? What do I need to do?
Just follow my instructions, and we'll start the process.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am the manual customer service of {00018}. Recently, our company discovered a good fund, and the trends are very good. If you are interested, you can click the link I sent you for a while and expand the reservation and purchase.

dialogue.text: Sorry, I'm customer service for {00018}. We found a good fund; trends are good. Click the link to reserve and purchase.
Oh, that sounds interesting. Where's the link?

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am a {00012} staff member. I received a report from a resident that another mobile phone number under your name is spreading a large number of spam messages. If you did not accept it yourself, you need to report the case to the {00002} public security and explain the situation.

dialogue.text: Sorry, I'm a {00012} staffer. A number under your name is sending spam. Report to {00002} security if it's not you.
Thanks, but I know this is a scam. I’ll contact {00002} myself.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, this is the account manager of {00019}. This is how our company's house is in activities. Do you think you need it? Which location do you consider?

dialogue.text: Sorry, this is the account manager of {00019}. Interested?
I'm not interested, I know this is a scam.
I see. Have a nice day.

first_turn: Hello, it takes a few minutes to delay your time. Here is the agent of {00020}. I have tickets for the concert they will hold next week. If you are interested, you can click on the link I sent you for a while and expand the reservation to purchase.

dialogue.text: Takes a few minutes of your time. I'm the agent of {00020}. Tickets for next week's concert. Click the link I sent to reserve.
Oh, really? I didn't know there was a concert next week.
Yes, it's a special event. Limited tickets available for {00020}.
Sounds interesting! I'll check the link now.
